name: Café Aroma, Latte
description: A creamy coffee made with a shot of espresso and steamed milk.

name: Magical Coffee, Espresso
description: Strong and bold coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Coffee Time, Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water, offering a milder flavor similar to traditional brewed coffee.

name: Love of Coffee, Americano
description: A smooth version of espresso with added water, served black without milk.
